item.title: SUDO For Those About To Root Funny Black Design for Computer Geeks
item.description: Using the sudo program instead of logging into a superuser account is a good practice for system administrators on Unix/Linux operating systems. This design is for admins with a sense of humor who enjoy Rock’n’Roll and Hard Rock music. Suitable...
